messages.original:
Site of the drone crash in Tartu County, Estonia.
Local authorities stated that the drone is not related to Russia and is most likely a Ukrainian kamikaze drone that was flying to strike Russian territory.
Pretty much confirms that Ukraine or the west is using NATO territory and airspace to deliver kamikaze drones to Russian infrastructure. We also saw how during the spiderweb operation ‚ÄúUkrainian intelligence‚Äù smuggled parts in through NATO countries. 
We wonder why Russia didn‚Äôt want Georgia or Ukraine to join NATO 
ü§£

Ballistic missile launch from Yemen to Israel
Ballistic missile launch from Yemen to Israel
Flying to central Israel. Jerusalem - Tel Aviv area.
Flights in and out of Ben Gurion International Airport in Tel Aviv have been temporarily suspended due to the ballistic missile launch.

A Ukrainian Leopard tank somehow managed to drive into the Pokrovsk salient, move through the whole city, and reach its southern edge near the frontline without being hit by a Russian FPV drone. 
I've marked the approximate path it took, along with the building it attacked - a high-rise apartment building on the southern edge of the Lazurnyi Microdistrict occupied by Russian DRGs. The video is likely recent, as the path it took had high Russian DRG activity on it up until around 2 weeks ago. 
Coordinates
: 48.253113, 37.179364

Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu characterised yesterday's attacks on Nasser Medical Centre in southern Gaza that killed 20 people, including 5 journalists, as a "mishap", claiming that Israel "values the work of journalists, medical staff, and and‚Ä¶

The IDF published the results of their "preliminary investigation" into their attacks on the Nasser Medical Complex in southern Gaza. They claimed that Hamas had a camera on top of the hospital, which was filming IDF activity, and that the drone strike aimed to destroy it. This was previously reported by unofficial Israeli sources shortly after the attack.
The IDF also claimed that 6 of those killed were militants from an unspecified organisation. It did not comment on the second drone strike which targeted civil defence workers rescuing journalists and other civilians.
High threat of Iskander launches from Taganrog, Rostov Oblast.
No Iskanders were detected in Ukrainian airspace.

Russian forces have re-established control over the village of Myrne, northeastern flank of Pokrovsk, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~24.
Total land area: ~0.62km¬≤.
This area was cleared of Ukrainian DRGs and assault groups after Russian reserve units from the 51st army were deployed to unblock the Pokrovsk - Kostyantynivka Highway.

Ukrainian news outlet Ukrainska Pravda published a report outlining the number of criminal proceedings that took place for deserters from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. According to their information, citing data from the Unified Register of Crimes, the following figures were recorded:
2022: 6,988 proceedings
2023: 17,658 proceedings
2024: 67,840 proceedings
2025: 110,511 proceedings (from January - July)
Total: 202,997 proceedings
They also published the number of proceedings in which charges were filed:
2022: 3,471 (49.67%)
2023: 7,883 (44.64%)
2024: 23,343 (34.41%)
2025: 15,361 (13.90%) (from January - July) 
Total: 50,058 (24.66%)
This means that this year, on average, 524 criminal proceedings for desertion were opened every single day.
